tool_description: Assigns priority levels to cleaning tasks based on health impact, visibility, difficulty, and user preferences.

task_id.description: Identifier of the task to prioritize

visibility_level.description: How noticeable when undone (high, medium, low)

guest_factor.description: Whether task matters for guest visits

seasonal_boost.description: Whether task gets seasonal priority increase

error_messages: Invalid task_id: Task ID does not exist
Invalid health_impact: Must be one of [critical, important, minor]
Invalid visibility_level: Must be one of [high, medium, low]
Invalid user_importance: Must be integer between 1 and 10
usage: Assign priorities to tasks to help with scheduling decisions. Higher priority tasks get better time slots and are less likely to be postponed.
